events.description: The release of retail sales data for December 2025 showing a significant slowdown in growth compared to the previous month.

facts.fact_text: Retail sales in Singapore increased by 2.7% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Retail sales in Singapore rose by 2.7% year-on-year in December 2025

facts.fact_text: The previous month's retail sales growth was revised to 6.2%.

evidences.evidence_text: slowing from a downwardly revised and near two-year high of 6.2% gain in the previous month

facts.fact_text: On a seasonally adjusted monthly basis, retail sales fell by 5.4%.

evidences.evidence_text: On a seasonally adjusted monthly basis, retail sales tumbled to 5.4%

facts.fact_text: Sales for petrol service stations declined by 9.1%.

claims.claim_text: The December 2025 retail sales growth was the weakest since September 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: This marked the weakest growth since September 2025

claims.claim_text: The monthly decline in retail sales was the steepest since May 2021.

evidences.evidence_text: marking the steepest decline since May 2021

evidence.evidence_text: Retail sales in Singapore rose by 2.7% year-on-year in December 2025, slowing from a downwardly revised and near two-year high of 6.2% gain
In addition, sales slipped for department stores (-1.7% vs 2.6%)
